_comment_rate_limit_delay: Delay between heavy operations (open/close/calibrate/status). Benchmark showed locker operations take ~3.6s avg. Recommended minimum: 5.0s to prevent overloading.
_comment_rate_limit_delay_light: Delay between light operations (gateway status/list). Benchmark showed gateway operations take ~0.13s avg. Conservative setting: 1.0s for extra safety.
